sentences.sContent: I’m the CEO of the company.
sentences.sCn: 我是这家公司的首席执行官。

sentences.sContent: That is about me this time. I am the CEO.
sentences.sContent_eng: That is about me this time. I am the CEO.
sentences.sCn: 这次才是我的时代，我是首席执行官。

sentences.sContent: Then he went to work for a battery research company and waited years before the founder promoted him to CEO.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then he went to work for a battery research company and waited years before the founder promoted him to CEO.
sentences.sCn: 随后他去了一家电池研究公司工作，历经数年，直到创始人将他提拔为首席执行官。

trans.tranCn: 首席执行官；执行总裁（chief executive officer）
